author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Africans in China: We face coronavirus discrimination
description: The Guangzhou authorities deny their actions have been racist, but admit that all African nationals have been tested.
content:
Image caption
 Africans in Guangzhou have complained that they have been forced from their accommodation
Ade* was given until midnight to vacate his apartment. 
Five months earlier, the Nigerian student had moved to Guangzhou, southern China, to study comp… [+7001 chars]
